title: "Some Of My Favorite Images From ArtStation's AI Protests"
excerpt: "We first wrote about this saga back on December 13, when an increasing number of AI-created images appearing on ArtStation’s front page prompted a backlash from artists. In response, ArtStation’s owners Epic Games said: ArtStation’s content guidelines do not prohibit the use of AI tools in the process of creating artwork that is shared with the community."
